page.title: 19ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: IN {LUTHRIE}AND{MOONZIE}NOBODY SELLS THEIR{ARTS AND CRAFTS.}THEY MAKE THINGS JUST FOR PLEASURE. THEY DO LOTS OF DIFFERENT{ARTS AND CRAFTS,}FOR EXAMPLE{KNITTING,CROCHETING,NEEDLE {WORK, PHOTOGRAPHY,MAKING WINE,COOKING, {DRESS MAKING,RESTORING OLD FURNITURE, {PAINTING,MAKING MODEL AEROPLANES}AND{ {FLOWER ARRANGING.}THE PEOPLE WHO DO{ {ARTS AND CRAFTS}USE THE OBJECTS THEY MAKE TO FURNISH THEIR HOUSES AND FOR ENTERING LOCAL SHOWS.MOST OF THE LADIES WHO DO NEEDLE WORK OR KNITTING BELONG TO THE{WOMEN'S GUILD}OR THE {SWRI.}SOME GIVE DEMONSTRATIONS OF THEIR {ART AND CRAFT.}
